reviews.review: Siempre recomendare este juego y el 2 pq en el modo online te cagas de risa

Otra obra maestra de Valve, Left 4 Dead es un titulo de zombies excelente, cargado de adrenalina y frenetismo, aunque con su toque sombr√≠o, puedes jugar en linea y con amigos, tambi√©n lo puedes jugar solo pero se disfruta much√≠simo mas con amigos, y si lo quieres jugar con desconocidos en linea que puede que quieran tus ri√±ones, la comunidad esta muy activa.

Tambien se basa mucho en la rejugabilidad, puedes jugar una misma campa√±a muchas veces sin cansarte o aburrirte, aunque a veces se hace repetitivo.

En conclusion, recomendado, Left 4 Dead es un titulo divertido, frenetico y muy recomendado

9/10

It's classic,but filled with almost most tryharded community and usually toxic one,I mean true fans that played this game for more than 1000 hours,and for a newbie which I am, I don't really like it.
I advise you to play only in campaign mode,that is not really bad as versus.
Me gusto el juego es muy entretenido ya que siendo un juego de shooter o disparos con mucha cantidad de zombies y si vale la pena comprarlo se los recomiendo al 100%
My favorite game. Hands down. Besides Halo and GOW :)

Although I said that I preferred the game 'No More Room in Hell" over Left 4 Dead... I still love this game, I love this game for how fucking funny and addictive it can and will be. Unlike No More Room in Hell, Left 4 Dead doesn't take this completely realistic take and just go full ape mode on you.

Playing with friends and mods may be funny as hell, but playing singleplayer or on difficult modes is still fun as hell.

Left 4 Dead is pure fun! You enjoy shooting zombies like there is no tomorrow? Then this is your game.
Es muy entretenido y en ocasiones te llega a pegar alg√∫n susto, puedes jugar en modo online y con suerte conocer gente muy copada (Divertida) que te ayuda a jugara si eres principiante
mi enenmigo en este juego es el ping

Jogo bem legal e interativo porem as vezes e meio repetitivo,e isso imcomoda um pouquinho,pois a fisica e otima,graficos bons, e os zumbi interage com forme vc age isso e bem legal,mas meu ponto negativo do jogo e que ele poderia ter um modo historia mas o jogo e otimo,jogo o modo campanha sozinho mesmo que eu prefiro isso
O jogo continua bom com amigos. Por√©m o online acabou ficando morto, infestado de hackers e cheio de maluco que fica matando os aliados.
jogo bom passei bastante tempo jogando
el mejor juego sin duda de zombies
One game I can say for sure is just as good as I remember it being when I played it as a kid. Good ol' fashioned zombie hunting without extra fuss.

Zombie Apocalyse game with a lot of replayability.
I love the co-op modes as survivor or the special infected.
The user created maps are also a blast.
This game rocks.
La campa√±a es corta pero muy buena, una dificultad justa y a pesar de que lo empec√© a jugar en 2021 me pareci√≥ entretenido.
el juego esta muy  bueno, muy bien optimizado y muy entretenido, el unico problema es que el online es un poco flojo donde es muy antiguo pero fuera de eso esta un 10/10

TL;DR: ich shootenn zombenn

Left 4 Dead is an inbread child between Counter-Strike and zombie survival games and that's a good thing. While it does't have a [b] D E E P [/b] plot and lore with 10 plot twists like portal or half-life L4D still has an amazing atmosphere and gameplay overall. 

Even if the game gets [i] a lil bit [/i] repetitive ( [spoiler] opsy daysy car made boom [/spoiler] >> shoot zombie>> go to safe house>> repeat 2 or more times>> bossfight>> you get saved>> repeat for every campaign), it still manages to surprise you with a completely new environment or a somehow different combat (loot and enemies are at random and campaigns take place in pretty different locations).

did i mentioned they got the legs right 11/10

Don't buy it for playing on public severs tho. L4D2 pretty much killed it and now the playerbase sits around 700, most of those playing in groups and kicking everybody else that joins. 

The game is still more then enjoyable w/ friends or single player with bots even if they'll probably jump into molotovs 50% of the time.

Es Left 4 Dead el primero.
Se vas a decir que es medi alpedo comprarse este en ves de 2,pero tienes que admitir que la estetica,graficos y infectados del primero se ven mejores que en el 2.Ademas que aca es mas complicado que en el 2 para mi.
Compratelo en Rebajas o normalmente,vale la pena :D
it is old but it is a great game

Nubes y densas tinieblas le rodean, justicia y derecho son el fundamento de su trono.
Salmos 97:2
